Quality Education.reason: Course aims to help students excel in government accounting exams → relevant to Quality Education.

Zero Hunger.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to food security, agriculture, or nutrition.

Good Health and Well-being.reason: No evidence found in the course description concerning public health, healthcare systems, or well-being.

Quality Education.reason: The course is a form of higher education and aims to help students succeed in civil service exams, which is tangentially related to educational attainment.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: No evidence found in the course description concerning energy access, renewable energy, or energy efficiency.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course prepares students for public sector careers, contributing to decent work by training professionals for '政府主計單位' (government accounting/budgeting units).

在順利進入政府主計單位之後

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: No evidence found in the course description regarding industrial development, technological innovation, or infrastructure projects.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: No evidence found in the course description addressing social, economic, or political inequality.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to urban planning, housing, public transport, or community sustainability.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: A core competency is to 'understand and be able to identify... sustainability issues,' which is directly linked to the principles of responsible resource management in the public sector.
evidence: 理解與辨別道德、社會責任與永續議題的能力 (Students will understand and be able to identify ethics, social responsibility, and sustainability issues.)

Climate Action.reason: No evidence found in the course description regarding climate change, greenhouse gas emissions, or climate resilience.

Life Below Water.reason: No evidence found in the course description concerning marine ecosystems, conservation, or sustainable use of ocean resources.

Life on Land.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to terrestrial ecosystems, biodiversity, deforestation, or land degradation.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course core is '政府會計改革' (government accounting reform) to '評估政府的施政成果' (evaluate government performance) and '制定正確的施政決策' (make correct policy decisions), directly building effective and accountable institutions.
evidence: 讓人民能有效地評估政府的施政成果
協助政府官員制定正確的施政決策

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course emphasizes that reforms are undertaken '為了與國際接軌' (to align with international standards), reflecting participation in global partnerships for institutional capacity-building.
evidence: 近代世界先進國家紛紛進行政府會計改革
